apple_vendor_description: This touching emoji on Apple devices portrays a tender moment between a woman with a medium skin tone and a man with a neutral skin tone, their faces gently angled towards each other for a kiss.  Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft lighting lend a warm, intimate glow to the figures, highlighting the curves of their faces and the gentle press of their lips.  The smooth gradients and rounded edges create an endearing and heartfelt representation of affection, love, or a romantic gesture in digital communication.
